titles.title: To clarify the ability of members of the National Capital Planning Commission to serve after the expiration of their terms until successor members are appointed, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/14/2002--Introduced. Amends Federal law and the District of Columbia Code with respect to the National Capital Planning Commission to provide that: (1) the term of an appointed member of the Commission shall expire on April 30 of the final year of the term; and (2) the member may serve after the expiration of such term until a successor has taken office.
